data.name: GridDataEvent
desc: used to notify changes in the data represented by an XMutableGridDataModel.
Effectively, a GridDataEvent denotes a continuous two-dimensional cell range within a grid's data model, which is affected by a certain change.

items.name: FirstColumn
lines: denotes the first column affected by a change.
If FirstColumn is -1, the listener should assume that all rows of a grid's data model are affected.

items.name: FirstRow
lines: denotes the first row affected by a change.
If FirstRow is -1, the listener should assume that all rows of a grid's data model are affected.

items.name: LastColumn
lines: denotes the last column affected by a change

items.name: LastRow
lines: denotes the last row affected by a change
